# StartOfScan.SuccessiveApproximationBitPositionLow property

Specifies the point at which successive approximation ends, indicating the bit position for the final scan of a particular set of coefficients. Used in progressive JPEGs and is set to `0` in baseline JPEGs.

```csharp
public byte SuccessiveApproximationBitPositionLow { get; set; }
```
